forum.content:
男生貼文好像都沒人理...

Well... I really wanna make a friend with you guys, but nobody really cares about me. Maybe it's my fault, because I'm not good looking or something. How sad really, anyway if you want meet me, just add me and don't be shy. No matter where you are, I'll be your friend. Thanks.
forum.title: 早安，新朋友在哪？我單身，剛回國一個月。
